00053         public virtual void AddAppointment()
00054         {
00055             try
00056             {
00057                 string XMLNSInfo = "xmlns:g=\"DAV:\" "
00058                     + "xmlns:e=\"http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/\" "
00059                     + "xmlns:mapi=\"http://schemas.microsoft.com/mapi/\" "
00060                     + "xmlns:mapit=\"http://schemas.microsoft.com/mapi/proptag/\" "
00061                     + "xmlns:x=\"xml:\" xmlns:cal=\"urn:schemas:calendar:\" "
00062                     + "xmlns:dt=\"urn:uuid:c2f41010-65b3-11d1-a29f-00aa00c14882/\" "
00063                     + "xmlns:header=\"urn:schemas:mailheader:\" "
00064                     + "xmlns:mail=\"urn:schemas:httpmail:\"";
00065 
00066                 string CalendarInfo = "<cal:location>" + Location + "</cal:location>"// + Location + "</cal:location>"
00067                     + "<cal:dtstart dt:dt=\"dateTime.tz\">" + StartDate.ToUniversalTime().ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.000Z") + "</cal:dtstart>"// + StartDate.ToUniversalTime().ToString("yyyyMMddTHHmmssZ") + "</cal:dtstart>"
00068                     + "<cal:dtend dt:dt=\"dateTime.tz\">" + EndDate.ToUniversalTime().ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.000Z") + "</cal:dtend>"// + EndDate.ToUniversalTime().ToString("yyyyMMddTHHmmssZ") + "</cal:dtend>"
00069                     + "<cal:instancetype dt:dt=\"int\">0</cal:instancetype>"
00070                     + "<cal:busystatus>BUSY</cal:busystatus>"
00071                     + "<cal:meetingstatus>CONFIRMED</cal:meetingstatus>"
00072                     + "<cal:alldayevent dt:dt=\"boolean\">0</cal:alldayevent>"
00073                     + "<cal:responserequested dt:dt=\"boolean\">1</cal:responserequested>"
00074                     + "<cal:reminderoffset dt:dt=\"int\">900</cal:reminderoffset>"
00075                     + "<cal:uid>" + MeetingGUID.ToString("B") + "</cal:uid>";
00076 
00077                 string HeaderInfo = "<header:to>" + AttendeeList.ToString() + "</header:to>";
00078 
00079                 string MailInfo = "<mail:subject>" + Subject + "</mail:subject>"
00080                     + "<mail:htmldescription>" + Summary + "</mail:htmldescription>";
00081 
00082                 string AppointmentRequest = "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
00083                     + "<g:propertyupdate " + XMLNSInfo + ">"
00084                     + "<g:set><g:prop>"
00085                     + "<g:contentclass>urn:content-classes:appointment</g:contentclass>"
00086                     + "<e:outlookmessageclass>IPM.Appointment</e:outlookmessageclass>"
00087                     + MailInfo
00088                     + CalendarInfo
00089                     + HeaderInfo
00090                     + "<mapi:finvited dt:dt=\"boolean\">1</mapi:finvited>"
00091                     + "</g:prop></g:set>"
00092                     + "</g:propertyupdate>";
00093 
00094                 System.Net.HttpWebRequest PROPPATCHRequest = (System.Net.HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(ServerName + "/exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/" + MeetingGUID.ToString() + ".eml");
00095 
00096                 System.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();
00097                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00098                 {
00099                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(ServerName + "/exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/" + MeetingGUID.ToString() + ".eml"),
00100                                            "NTLM",
00101                                            new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password));
00102                 }
00103                 else
00104                 {
00105                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(ServerName + "/exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/" + MeetingGUID.ToString() + ".eml"),
00106                                            "Negotiate",
00107                                            (System.Net.NetworkCredential)CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials);
00108                 }
00109 
00110                 PROPPATCHRequest.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;
00111                 PROPPATCHRequest.Method = "PROPPATCH";
00112                 byte[] bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes((string)AppointmentRequest);
00113                 PROPPATCHRequest.ContentLength = bytes.Length;
00114                 using (System.IO.Stream PROPPATCHRequestStream = PROPPATCHRequest.GetRequestStream())
00115                 {
00116                     PROPPATCHRequestStream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);
00117                     PROPPATCHRequestStream.Close();
00118                     PROPPATCHRequest.ContentType = "text/xml";
00119                     System.Net.WebResponse PROPPATCHResponse = (System.Net.HttpWebResponse)PROPPATCHRequest.GetResponse();
00120                     PROPPATCHResponse.Close();
00121                 }
00122 
00123             }
00124             catch { throw; }
00125         }

00130         public virtual void EmailAppointment()
00131         {
00132             try
00133             {
00134                 using (MailMessage Mail = new MailMessage())
00135                 {
00136                     System.Net.Mime.ContentType TextType = new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/plain");
00137                     using (AlternateView TextView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(GetText(), TextType))
00138                     {
00139                         System.Net.Mime.ContentType HTMLType = new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/html");
00140                         using (AlternateView HTMLView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(GetHTML(false), HTMLType))
00141                         {
00142                             System.Net.Mime.ContentType CalendarType = new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/calendar");
00143                             CalendarType.Parameters.Add("method", "REQUEST");
00144                             CalendarType.Parameters.Add("name", "meeting.ics");
00145                             using (AlternateView CalendarView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(GetCalendar(false), CalendarType))
00146                             {
00147                                 CalendarView.TransferEncoding = System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding.SevenBit;
00148 
00149                                 Mail.AlternateViews.Add(TextView);
00150                                 Mail.AlternateViews.Add(HTMLView);
00151                                 Mail.AlternateViews.Add(CalendarView);
00152 
00153                                 Mail.From = new MailAddress(OrganizerEmail);
00154 
00155                                 foreach (MailAddress attendee in AttendeeList)
00156                                 {
00157                                     Mail.To.Add(attendee);
00158                                 }
00159 
00160 
00161                                 Mail.Subject = Subject;
00162 
00163                                 foreach (Attachment Attachment in Attachments)
00164                                 {
00165                                     Mail.Attachments.Add(Attachment);
00166                                 }
00167 
00168 
00169                                 SmtpClient Server = new SmtpClient(ServerName, Port);
00170                                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00171                                 {
00172                                     Server.Credentials = new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password);
00173                                 }
00174                                 if (AttendeeList.Count > 0)
00175                                 {
00176                                     Server.Send(Mail);
00177                                 }
00178                             }
00179                         }
00180                     }
00181                 }
00182             }
00183             catch { throw; }
00184         }
00185 
00189         public virtual void SendCancelEmails()
00190         {
00191             try
00192             {
00193                 using (MailMessage Mail = new MailMessage())
00194                 {
00195                     System.Net.Mime.ContentType TextType = new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/plain");
00196                     using (AlternateView TextView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(GetText(), TextType))
00197                     {
00198                         System.Net.Mime.ContentType HTMLType = new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/html");
00199                         using (AlternateView HTMLView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(GetHTML(true), HTMLType))
00200                         {
00201                             System.Net.Mime.ContentType CalendarType = new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/calendar");
00202                             CalendarType.Parameters.Add("method", "CANCEL");
00203                             CalendarType.Parameters.Add("name", "meeting.ics");
00204                             using (AlternateView CalendarView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(GetCalendar(true), CalendarType))
00205                             {
00206                                 CalendarView.TransferEncoding = System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding.SevenBit;
00207 
00208                                 Mail.AlternateViews.Add(TextView);
00209                                 Mail.AlternateViews.Add(HTMLView);
00210                                 Mail.AlternateViews.Add(CalendarView);
00211 
00212                                 Mail.From = new MailAddress(OrganizerEmail);
00213                                 foreach (MailAddress attendee in AttendeeList)
00214                                 {
00215                                     Mail.To.Add(attendee);
00216                                 }
00217                                 Mail.Subject = Subject + " - Cancelled";
00218                                 foreach (Attachment Attachment in Attachments)
00219                                 {
00220                                     Mail.Attachments.Add(Attachment);
00221                                 }
00222                                 SmtpClient Server = new SmtpClient(ServerName, Port);
00223                                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00224                                 {
00225                                     Server.Credentials = new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password);
00226                                 }
00227                                 if (AttendeeList.Count > 0)
00228                                 {
00229                                     Server.Send(Mail);
00230                                 }
00231                             }
00232                         }
00233                     }
00234                 }
00235             }
00236             catch { throw; }
00237         }

00242         public virtual void CancelAppointment()
00243         {
00244             try
00245             {
00246                 System.Net.HttpWebRequest PROPPATCHRequest = (System.Net.HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(ServerName + "/exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/" + MeetingGUID.ToString() + ".eml");
00247 
00248                 System.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();
00249                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00250                 {
00251                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(ServerName + "/exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/" + MeetingGUID.ToString() + ".eml"),
00252                                        "NTLM",
00253                                        new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password));
00254                 }
00255                 else
00256                 {
00257                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(ServerName + "/exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/" + MeetingGUID.ToString() + ".eml"),
00258                                            "Negotiate",
00259                                            (System.Net.NetworkCredential)CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials);
00260                 }
00261 
00262                 PROPPATCHRequest.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;
00263                 PROPPATCHRequest.Method = "DELETE";
00264                 System.Net.WebResponse PROPPATCHResponse = (System.Net.HttpWebResponse)PROPPATCHRequest.GetResponse();
00265                 PROPPATCHResponse.Close();
00266             }
00267             catch { throw; }
00268         }

00277         private string GetText()
00278         {
00279             try
00280             {
00281                 string Body = "Type:Single Meeting\n" +
00282                     "Organizer:" + OrganizerName + "\n" +
00283                     "Start Time:" + StartDate.ToLongDateString() + " " + StartDate.ToLongTimeString() + "\n" +
00284                     "End Time:" + EndDate.ToLongDateString() + " " + EndDate.ToLongTimeString() + "\n" +
00285                     "Time Zone:" + System.TimeZone.CurrentTimeZone.StandardName + "\n" +
00286                     "Location: " + Location + "\n\n" +
00287                     "*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*\n\n" +
00288                     Summary;
00289                 return Body;
00290             }
00291             catch { throw; }
00292         }
00293 
00299         private string GetHTML(bool Canceled)
00300         {
00301             try
00302             {
00303                 string bodyHTML = "<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN\">\r\n<HTML>\r\n<HEAD>\r\n<META HTTP-EQUIV=\"Content-Type\" CONTENT=\"text/html; charset=utf-8\">\r\n<META NAME=\"Generator\" CONTENT=\"MS Exchange Server version 6.5.7652.24\">\r\n<TITLE>{0}</TITLE>\r\n</HEAD>\r\n<BODY>\r\n<!-- Converted from text/plain format -->\r\n<P><FONT SIZE=2>Type:Single Meeting<BR>\r\nOrganizer:{1}<BR>\r\nStart Time:{2}<BR>\r\nEnd Time:{3}<BR>\r\nTime Zone:{4}<BR>\r\nLocation:{5}<BR>\r\n<BR>\r\n*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*<BR>\r\n<BR>\r\n{6}<BR>\r\n</FONT>\r\n</P>\r\n\r\n</BODY>\r\n</HTML>";
00304                 string TempSummary = Summary;
00305                 if (Canceled)
00306                 {
00307                     TempSummary += " - Canceled";
00308                 }
00309                 return string.Format(bodyHTML,
00310                     TempSummary,
00311                     OrganizerName,
00312                     StartDate.ToLongDateString() + " " + StartDate.ToLongTimeString(),
00313                     EndDate.ToLongDateString() + " " + EndDate.ToLongTimeString(),
00314                     System.TimeZone.CurrentTimeZone.StandardName,
00315                     Location,
00316                     TempSummary);
00317             }
00318             catch { throw; }
00319         }
00320 
00327         private string GetCalendar(bool Canceled)
00328         {
00329             try
00330             {
00331                 string DateFormatUsing = "yyyyMMddTHHmmssZ";
00332                 string Method;
00333                 if (!Canceled)
00334                     Method = "REQUEST";
00335                 else
00336                     Method = "CANCEL";
00337                 string bodyCalendar = "BEGIN:VCALENDAR\r\nMETHOD:{10}\r\nPRODID:Microsoft CDO for Microsoft Exchange\r\nVERSION:2.0\r\nBEGIN:VTIMEZONE\r\nTZID:(GMT-06.00) Central Time (US & Canada)\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-TZID:11\r\nBEGIN:STANDARD\r\nDTSTART:16010101T020000\r\nTZOFFSETFROM:-0500\r\nTZOFFSETTO:-0600\r\nRRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;WKST=MO;INTERVAL=1;BYMONTH=11;BYDAY=1SU\r\nEND:STANDARD\r\nBEGIN:DAYLIGHT\r\nDTSTART:16010101T020000\r\nTZOFFSETFROM:-0600\r\nTZOFFSETTO:-0500\r\nRRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;WKST=MO;INTERVAL=1;BYMONTH=3;BYDAY=2SU\r\nEND:DAYLIGHT\r\nEND:VTIMEZONE\r\nBEGIN:VEVENT\r\nDTSTAMP:{8}\r\nDTSTART:{0}\r\nSUMMARY:{7}\r\nUID:{5}\r\nATTENDEE;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;PARTSTAT=NEEDS-ACTION;RSVP=TRUE;CN=\"{9}\":MAILTO:{9}\r\nACTION;RSVP=TRUE;CN=\"{4}\":MAILTO:{4}\r\nORGANIZER;CN=\"{3}\":mailto:{4}\r\nLOCATION:{2}\r\nDTEND:{1}\r\nDESCRIPTION:{7}\\N\r\nSEQUENCE:1\r\nPRIORITY:5\r\nCLASS:\r\nCREATED:{8}\r\nLAST-MODIFIED:{8}\r\nSTATUS:CONFIRMED\r\nTRANSP:OPAQUE\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-BUSYSTATUS:BUSY\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-INSTTYPE:0\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-INTENDEDSTATUS:BUSY\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-ALLDAYEVENT:FALSE\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-IMPORTANCE:1\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-OWNERAPPTID:-1\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-ATTENDEE-CRITICAL-CHANGE:{8}\r\nX-MICROSOFT-CDO-OWNER-CRITICAL-CHANGE:{8}\r\nBEGIN:VALARM\r\nACTION:DISPLAY\r\nDESCRIPTION:REMINDER\r\nTRIGGER;RELATED=START:-PT00H15M00S\r\nEND:VALARM\r\nEND:VEVENT\r\nEND:VCALENDAR\r\n";
00338                 bodyCalendar = string.Format(bodyCalendar,
00339                     StartDate.ToUniversalTime().ToString(DateFormatUsing),
00340                     EndDate.ToUniversalTime().ToString(DateFormatUsing),
00341                     Location,
00342                     OrganizerName,
00343                     OrganizerEmail,
00344                     MeetingGUID.ToString("B"),
00345                     Summary,
00346                     Subject,
00347                     DateTime.Now.ToUniversalTime().ToString(DateFormatUsing),
00348                     AttendeeList.ToString(),
00349                     Method);
00350                 return bodyCalendar;
00351             }
00352             catch { throw; }
00353         }
